name: The Fable of the Kabu
description:
The Fable of Kabu is a game made entirely on a mobile phone (specifically, a Realme 7i with Android 11).

Made in Môsi and based in the Oniria World universe.

Use the arrows to move.

  • This is not a puzzle game, is an interactive narration.
  • Different forms of completing the history exists, and all are fine.
  • Is a game without objectives, enjoy the history.
  • The fastest game is less than 5 minutes, and the completest one is like 10-20 minutes.
  • There is an easter egg and 3 finals (3 final texts).

(Ir a la versión española)
